imdb.title: High School DxD
imdb.plot: After being killed on his first date, idiotic and perverted Issei Hyodo is resurrected as a demon by Rias Gremory only to be recruited into her club of high-class devils.

episodes.title: Special 1: Going Sunbathing!
episodes.plot: The Occult Research Club goes on a beach outing. Issei messes up applying sun lotion to Rias, and is punished by being beaten by Koneko with a baseball bat.

episodes.title: Special 2: Akeno's Personal Training!
episodes.plot: Issei is being given lessons in magic by Akeno. After getting beaten, he spills a parfait on her. She requests him to lick it off her chest. At this point, Issei wakes up in Asia's lap and gets shocked by Rassei.

episodes.title: Special 3: A Little Bold, Koneko-Chan... Nyan!
episodes.plot: Koneko accidentally has her personality reversed magically, making her incredibly sexually active and reversing her sexual preference.

episodes.title: Special 4: The Untold Story of the Dress Break's Birth!
episodes.plot: A few flashbacks of how Issei first found out and eventually perfected his special move, Dress Break.

episodes.title: Special 5: Making Udon!
episodes.plot: As part of the penalty from a bet, Sona and Tsubaki make udon for the Occult Research Club; however an accident makes the udon come to life in a very peculiar way.

episodes.title: Special 6: Asia Transforms!
episodes.plot: Asia wants to prove she is just as bad as any demon by using ideas found in Issei's magazines, going as far as dressing up like a harlot and seducing him, but Issei tells her to just be herself.

episodes.title: Special 7: Maximum Titillation - Rias and Akeno's Womanly Battle!?
episodes.plot: At the clubroom, Rias and Akeno compete for Issei's affections. Rias begins by acting and dressing like a sexy school teacher with her breasts exposed, promising Issei he can touch them if he passes his test. Akeno plays the role of housewife wearing nothing but an apron and also exposes her breasts to Issei, who becomes more excited.

episodes.title: Special 8: Maximum Titillation - The Church Trio's Underwear, Amen!
episodes.plot: Within the girls changing room at Kuoh Academy, Irina notices that Xenovia has bought new lingerie, who starts showing it off. Irina does the same with her white lingerie and brags about it being the best kind for a believer such as herself. Xenovia then forcibly strips Asia to see hers, much to her embarrassment, though both Irina and Xenovia find her outfit cute.

episodes.title: Special 9: Maximum Titillation - Koneko's Healing Sage Arts, Meow
episodes.plot: In Issei's room, Koneko embraces him while using her Senjutsu to replenish his life span that was used up when he used Juggernaut Drive during episode 9. She holds Issei tighter and has him promise to never use that transformation again. Koneko recommends a more efficient way to heal him called Bouchuujutsu, which requires the women to share her 'Ki' directly to a man's core via sex. Issei, who is flustered at the idea, tries to reject the offer.

episodes.title: Special 10: Maximum Titillation - Levia and So
episodes.plot: Serafall is having trouble deciding between a pink and a blue Magical Girl outfit for her TV show, so she asks her sister Sona try on the blue one for better visualization though she declines at first, she begrudgingly accepts when her older sister begins to whines and threatens to quiting her job as a Satan and destroy every Angel and Fallen Angel.

episodes.title: Special 11: Maximum Titillation - Steamy Grayfia
episodes.plot: At the Gremory House, while Issei is taking a bath, Grayfia comes in naked and begins to wash his back which arouses Issei and also while coming on a bit close to him by showing an admiration towards him for defeating many strong enemies. Puzzled by her odd behavior, Issei realizes that she is drunk. Noticing that Issei had been staring at her breast, Grayfia notes that the only ones who have seen her naked are Sirzech and him.

episodes.title: Special 12: Maximum Titillation - Rossweisse's True Teaching Story!
episodes.plot: At Kuoh Academy, Rossweisse is a bit dissatisfied that Issei is the only club member who has to take the make up test while she has to assist him, worried that he might be held back a year, as a teacher she'll make sure that he passes. However when Issei drops his rubber, immediately thinking he will look up her skirt and use Dress Break that could cause him to be held back, she tries to prevent that but ends up pressing her breast in his face.

episodes.title: Holiness Behind the Gym
episodes.plot: Hyodo Issei is not your average high schooler. In fact, he is a reincarnated devil who dreams of becoming the Harem King. He usually spends his school days in peace, together with his many friends. However, one day a devil named Diodora appeared...

episodes.title: That's Right, Let's Go to Kyoto
episodes.plot: Issei prepares for his school trip to Kyoto, but before he leaves, he must go with Rias and the others to the Gremory household so Rias can report the completion of her family. There, they meet Sairaorg, who requests a little hand-to-hand with Issei.

episodes.title: School Trip, an Abrupt Attack
episodes.plot: Issei and his classmates arrive in Kyoto. Although Issei is ready to enjoy Kyoto to the fullest, getting stronger is always on his mind. However, it seems training isn't the only thing to worry about in Kyoto. Powerful groups have begun to move.

episodes.title: The Party of Heroes
episodes.plot: Issei and the others continue their training, even while they fully enjoy themselves in Kyoto. Issei's group meets the mysterious nine-tailed fox once again and, this time, she begs them to help the youkai save her mother from the Chaos Brigade.

episodes.title: Showdown! Gremory Family vs. Hero Faction in Kyoto
episodes.plot: The Hero Faction has arrived and Cao Cao wants to cross blades with Azazel and the Red Dragon Emperor. In such a dire situation, Issei must respond quickly so all his friends make it out of this alive. Will he ever find his "potential" and release it?

episodes.title: My Potential Released!
episodes.plot: Issei and his team meet with Cao Cao at the Nijo Castle and find Kunou's mother there. A showdown between the two factions begins. Pushed into a corner, Issei finally finds it inside himself to unleash his inner potential and call for what is his.

episodes.title: The School Trip is in Pandemonium
episodes.plot: Issei summons his beloved President into the heat of the battle in Kyoto. As she floats before him, Elsha whispers into his ear to poke her boobs. Pressing the switch releases his potential power and Issei challenges Cao Cao once again.

episodes.title: We Are Preparing for the School Festival!
episodes.plot: The Chaos Brigade has quieted down since their stunt in Kyoto so Issei and the others must now focus on other issues. After all, there are hero shows to act in, a school festival to prepare for, and the ever-looming Rating Game with Sairaorg...

episodes.title: A Girl's Heart is Complicated
episodes.plot: The Gremory family is now in full training mode for the upcoming Rating Game. However, Issei has a lot of other things on his plate. There's a school festival to prepare for and a press conference to overcome. On top of that Rias is acting strange?!

episodes.title: The Deciding Battle of the Strongest Youth, Begins!
episodes.plot: The Rating Game is about to start, but Issei has things to figure out. He has formulated a guess as to why Rias is acting the way she is, but does he dare believe it? His girls give him courage. And, finally, their team steps out into the battlefield.

episodes.title: As a Family Member of Rias Gremory
episodes.plot: The Game has officially begun and the dices keep rolling. One by one various members of each family fight and slowly retire from the Game. Everyone in the Gremory household is risking their lives and fighting desperately to bring Rias victory.

episodes.title: Man Against Man
episodes.plot: Sairaorg has finally risen up to the stage and Kiba, Xenovia, and Rossweisse team up against him. The battle is swift and brutal and Issei is finally reaching his bursting point. Will he be able to channel his feelings? Or will resentment take over?

episodes.title: Lion Heart of the School Festival
episodes.plot: Issei purges the curse of his Sacred Gear and stands up once again, in his form as a Queen piece. Sairaorg and Issei duke it out in one final fist fight where winner takes all. After that, the only thing he has to worry about is his confession to Rias...

episodes.title: Summer Break! Off to the Underworld!
episodes.plot: Summer break is coming up fast for Hyodo Issei, but all his plans are put on hold when he finds out he is to accompany Rias for her visit back home to the underworld! A new adventure is about to begin and all the while Koneko is not acting herself.

episodes.title: Young Devils Gather
episodes.plot: Issei and the others begin their training to improve each of their skills. All the while things are happening around them as powerful people gather to fight against the Chaos Brigade. All the young devils gather in one place.

episodes.title: Cat and Dragon
episodes.plot: Koneko's sister Kuroka has appeared to take her sister away from Rias Gremory. Issei and Rias chase after her to stop that from happening. At the same time, a figure who objects to these alliances between mythologies appears at the great gathering.

episodes.title: Interception, Commence!
episodes.plot: Loki has been sealed away, but only temporarily. Rias and her family are among the volunteers trying to hold him back, while Odin returns North to retrieve the powerful hammer Mjolnir. Will everyone be able to stand up and fight against a god?

episodes.title: The Last Day of Summer Break!
episodes.plot: With Loki defeated, Rias and her household return to the human world to finish up their last days of summer. A pile of homework awaits Issei, but he goes on a date with Akeno instead! Akeno throws herself at Issei, hoping to forget her terrible past.

episodes.title: Second Semester Has Started!
episodes.plot: Issei and the others are back to school and their daily lives. Irina and Rossweisse both start to live at Issei's house and the sports festival is fast approaching. During all of this, Diodora Astaroth appears before Asia and proposes to her?!

episodes.title: Night Before the Battle!
episodes.plot: Diodora continues to pester sweet Asia as the Rating Game approaches. Issei and the others prepare for battle as dark things brew in the background. When the Gremory household jumps to the field, they find themselves in an unexpected battle!

episodes.title: We Will Save Asia!
episodes.plot: Rias and her household leave the fighting of the Chaos Brigade to the adults as they rush toward the temple to save Asia. There, Diodora replaces the Rating Game with a little game of his own. They must fight against his forces to get Asia back!

episodes.title: Dragon of Dragon
episodes.plot: The sudden death of Asia surprises Issei and makes him trigger Juggernaut Drive. While Rias and her household try to save him, Azazel and Sir Zechs meet the leader of the Chaos Brigade! What is her true intention for creating the organization?

episodes.title: The Occult Club Disappears?!
episodes.plot: Asia saves Issei by healing the dragon within him after his incomplete transformation. Finally, they all make it back home and enjoy their peaceful days. After Loki fails with Issei, he turns his evil grasp toward Rias.

episodes.title: I Will Fight!
episodes.plot: Issei goes to see Vali for help, which is in itself an action against the underworld. With the help of Arthur and his Holy Royal Sword Collbrande, the Rias household goes to the Dimensional Gap. There, they meet Rias and try to bring her back.

episodes.title: Any Time, for All Time!
episodes.plot: Issei must stop Rias by fighting against her. As she pummels him with attacks, Issei recalls various memories that he shared with her. Unable to leave Rias in such a state, he runs forward to bring back the regal and dignified Rias he remembers.

episodes.title: OVA: The Unresurrected Phoenix
episodes.plot: Issei goes to the Underworld to help and train Riser Phenex who has lost all confidence in himself by the request of Ravel Phenex.

episodes.title: Another Disquieting Premonition!
episodes.plot: Issei is back with Rias and Asia living in his house, and Kiba starts acting weird when he sees a picture of a holy sword at Issei's house.

episodes.title: The Holy Sword Is Here!
episodes.plot: Issei gets another warning about the white dragon, and church followers bearing Holy Swords pay a visit to the devils.

episodes.title: I'll Destroy the Holy Sword!
episodes.plot: Issei and Kiba fight the Xenovia and Irina, and Issei tries to deal with the consequences of their fight.

episodes.title: A Strong Enemy Appeared!
episodes.plot: Issei and the others team up with the church to fight Freed, but an even greater enemy appears.

episodes.title: Decisive Battle at Kuoh Academy!
episodes.plot: The Kuoh Academy students fight Kokabiel and his minions to defend their school and their town.

episodes.title: Go! Occult Research Club!
episodes.plot: The Occult Research Club fights Kokabiel and learns some shocking truths about the power struggle between the angels, fallen angels, and devils.

episodes.title: Summer! Bathing Suits! I'm in Trouble!
episodes.plot: The Occult Research Club takes over cleaning the pool to thank the student council for their help with Kokabiel, and Issei runs into a lot of trouble.

episodes.title: Open House Begins!
episodes.plot: Issei learns more about the feud between the Twin Sky Dragons and Rias and Sona have to deal with troublesome family members at Open House.

episodes.title: I Have a Junior!
episodes.plot: The other Bishop of the House of Gremory is released, and Akeno takes Issei to meet a new acquaintance.

episodes.title: Various Three-way Deadlocks!
episodes.plot: Issei meets Michael, the Chief of the Angels, and continues training Gasper in the days leading up to the Leaders' Summit.

episodes.title: The Leaders' Summit Begins!
episodes.plot: Time stops during the Leaders' Summit, and Issei and the others meet a new enemy.

episodes.title: Clash of the Twin Heavenly Dragons!
episodes.plot: Issei battles Vali and discovers hidden depths to his power as the Twin Sky Dragons face off.

episodes.title: OVA: I'm Enveloped in Breasts!
episodes.plot: Asia is attacked by a monster which stole her undergarments as the Occult Research Club arrives to rescue her.

episodes.title: I Got a Girlfriend!
episodes.plot: Issei Hyodo's first date with his new girlfriend ends poorly when she turns into a monster and stabs him in the stomach. Luckily, he's saved by Rias, the buxom president of his school's Occult Research Club. And then, things really start to get weird...

episodes.title: I'm Done Being Human!
episodes.plot: Surprise! All the members of the Occult Research Club are devils, including new-recruit Issei, who's having difficulties figuring out the whole "demonic power" thing. Maybe he'd have better luck if Fallen Angels stopped popping up and trying to kill him.

episodes.title: I Made a Friend!
episodes.plot: Issei meets and befriends a girl named Asia Argento, a Sister who has arrived to serve at the town's church. Issei learns more about the chess game in which he has become a part, and the roles that he and his fellow devils play within it.

episodes.title: I'm Saving My Friend!
episodes.plot: Issei is determined to get stronger. He spends some more time with Asia, but once again, their circumstances keep them apart. Issei finds out that although pawns may not be very strong, they have a power that allows them to act like other chess pieces.

episodes.title: I Will Defeat My Ex-girlfriend!
episodes.plot: While Kiba and Koneko back him up, Issei rushes in to rescue a critically injured Asia. Leaving the others behind, Raynare and Issei become engaged in a duel to the death! Elsewhere, Rias and Akeno have their hands full with Raynare's fallen angels.

episodes.title: I Work as a Devil!
episodes.plot: New living arrangements are made for Asia, who has been living in the club's room. Meanwhile, Issei begins a new training regimen with Rias to improve his physical fitness. Asia begins attending school, where she is placed in Issei's class.

episodes.title: I Get a Familiar!
episodes.plot: Rias decides that it is time for Issei and Asia to have servant familiars. The school's student council visits the club room, and Issei learns that they are another faction of devils. The two groups compete to see who gets first pick of the new familiars.

episodes.title: I Pick a Fight!
episodes.plot: Issei dreams that he is marrying Rias, which leads him to get in touch with his inner dragon. Asia confesses a desire to have a deeper relationship with Issei. But it is Rias who appears in Issei's bedroom that night looking to lose her virginity!

episodes.title: I've Begun My Training!
episodes.plot: Issei and Asia undergo a special training camp with the other household members to get ready for the upcoming Rating Game. Issei struggles to figure out what his own special characteristic is. Rias explains more about devils and the Gremory family.

episodes.title: The Showdown Begins!
episodes.plot: The time for the start of the Rating Game arrives, and the contestants are transported to a battlefield in an alternate dimension. While Asia and Rias remain at their base, Issei and Koneko face the opposition, and Issei reveals his new signature move.

episodes.title: The Acclaimed Battle Continues!
episodes.plot: Kiba becomes entrenched in battle against Karlamine, one of Riser's knights, while Akeno fights Yubelluna, his queen. Meanwhile, Issei takes on Ravel and the other remaining pieces. Rias launches an all-or-nothing sneak attack against Riser.

episodes.title: I'm Here to Keep My Promise!
episodes.plot: Issei wakes up to find that the battle is over, and he has lost. Rias and the others are at a party in honor of her engagement to Riser, but with some help from Grayfia and Asia, Issei decides to crash it, rescue Rias, and bring her home with him!

episodes.title: OVA: I'm Harvesting Breasts!
episodes.plot: The Gremory group hunting a stray devil named Maverick. After sending him to stand trial in the Underworld it's discovered that he was working in a lab developing Chimeras.

episodes.title: OVA: I'm Searching for Breasts!
episodes.plot: Issei and Asia ask Rias to observe how the others do their jobs so they can learn how to do theirs better.
